TopicTitle: How about a passenger variant of the Mk II Lander Can?

Articles.Content: I frequently use the Mk II Lander Can in rover configuration for rotor craft builds.  The biggest drawback to this is the limited number of crew you can put in it.  I'd love to see a version with an additional 2 or 4 jump seats for moving Kerbals around.
like this idea, easy, simple, fits with all other parts. +1
